comments:
To test this, open the MultiEditor sample's plugin.xml.  Delete the version or
any required fields.  Then click on the error displayed in the Problem view to
go to the error, the plugin.xml tab is focused, but an error window pop up
displaying message to look in the error log for more details.  The error log
contains the following error:

!ENTRY org.eclipse.core.runtime 4 2 Aug 06, 2004 10:28:42.141
